subject: Re: New TV show
author: ghostboxchick
full_text:
-Hi kay, seams like youve taken alot of time to post this on alot of 
different boards.Yes i heard about it and wrote to tru tv about Moons 
false claims.
Sharon






-- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Kay" <psfponies@...> wrote:
>
> Has anyone heard about this new show? Looks like Chris Moon will be 
> starring in the up coming show that airs Feb 13. Might be worth 
> watching.
> 
> Kay
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  
>  Door to the Dead
>  
>  NEW!
>  
>  Premieres Fri, Feb. 13 at 10P on TRU TV
> 
> http://www.johnjoliver.com/index.php
>  
>  Door to the Dead follows psychic medium John Oliver as he 
> investigates a
> Virginia family beset by ghosts and on the verge of leaving their 
> property for
> good. John is joined in his mission by Chris Moon, an expert in all 
> things
> paranormal and possessor of Thomas Edison's mysterious 'telephone 
to 
> the
> dead', and Alison Smith, a one-time private investigator and 
> professional
> skeptic. Using all the spiritual, scientific, and investigatory 
means 
> available
> to them, John and his team must identify, evaluate, and eliminate 
> harmful
> energies from the haunted home and help any trapped souls 'cross-
over'
> into a more peaceful state.
>
